title: Today's NYT Connections Hints, Answers and Help for March 6, #634
description: Hints and answers for Connections for March 6, #634.
author: Gael Cooper
excerpt: Hints and answers for Connections for Thursday, March 6.
text: Looking for the most recent Connections answers? A couple of the categories have me thinking of spring and summer. But if you need help, we've got the answers. Read on for clues and today's Connections answers.The Times now has a Connections Bot, like the one for Wordle. Go there after you play to receive a numeric score and to have the program analyze your answers. Players who are registered with the Times Games section can now nerd out by following their progress, including number of puzzles completed, win rate, number of times they nabbed a perfect score and their win streak.Read more: Hints, Tips and Strategies to Help You Win at NYT Connections Every TimeHints for today's Connections groupsHere are four hints for the groupings in today's Connections puzzle, ranked from the easiest yellow group, to the tough (and sometimes bizarre) purple group.Yellow group hint: Grow weaker.Green group hint: Inch by inch, row by row.Blue group hint: Footwear.Purple group hint: Find it on the beach.Answers for today's Connections groupsYellow group: Wane.Green group: Do some tasks in the garden.Blue group: Shoes.Purple group: Sand ____.Read more: Wordle Cheat Sheet: Here Are the Most Popular Letters Used in English WordsWhat are today's Connections answers? The four answers are dwindle, fade, peter and taper.The green words in today's ConnectionsThe theme is do some tasks in the garden. The four answers are plant, prune, water and weed.The blue words in today's ConnectionsThe theme is shoes. The four answers are flat, Mary Jane, mule and slide.The purple words in today's ConnectionsThe theme is sand ____. The four answers are castle, paper, piper and stone.
html:
Looking for the most recent Connections answers? Click here for today's Connections hints, as well as our daily answers and hints for The New York Times Mini Crossword, Wordle, Connections: Sports Edition and Strands puzzles.

Today's Connections puzzle isn't too tricky. A couple of the categories have me thinking of spring and summer. But if you need help, we've got the answers. Read on for clues and today's Connections answers.

The Times now has a Connections Bot, like the one for Wordle. Go there after you play to receive a numeric score and to have the program analyze your answers. Players who are registered with the Times Games section can now nerd out by following their progress, including number of puzzles completed, win rate, number of times they nabbed a perfect score and their win streak.

Read more: Hints, Tips and Strategies to Help You Win at NYT Connections Every Time

Hints for today's Connections groups

Here are four hints for the groupings in today's Connections puzzle, ranked from the easiest yellow group, to the tough (and sometimes bizarre) purple group.

Yellow group hint: Grow weaker.

Green group hint: Inch by inch, row by row.

Blue group hint: Footwear.

Purple group hint: Find it on the beach.

Answers for today's Connections groups

Yellow group: Wane.

Green group: Do some tasks in the garden.

Blue group: Shoes.

Purple group: Sand ____.

Read more: Wordle Cheat Sheet: Here Are the Most Popular Letters Used in English Words

What are today's Connections answers?

The yellow words in today's Connections

The theme is wane. The four answers are dwindle, fade, peter and taper.

The green words in today's Connections

The theme is do some tasks in the garden. The four answers are plant, prune, water and weed.

The blue words in today's Connections

The theme is shoes. The four answers are flat, Mary Jane, mule and slide.

The purple words in today's Connections

The theme is sand ____. The four answers are castle, paper, piper and stone.
